name: LeadsRain
overview:
LeadsRain offers complete and turnkey call center solution to businesses all across the world. While the holistic hosted dialer solutions offered by us is certainly what has made us a brand but our consistent endeavor to transcend beyond the conventional thresholds have led us to create a new benchmark in the industry.

LeadsRain is the first company to offer a complete call center solution including hosted dialer, hosted IVR, voice broadcast and all other associated services on a ‘Pay Per Minute’ model.It has always been a principle at Aum LLC., the parent company of LeadsRain, to bring about the finest solutions based on state of the art technology in the most innovative manner and prices that put offer financial leverage to our clients.
